#Piped
precip_acc <- cdec_query(station ='ucm', sensor_num =2, dur_code ='E', start_date ='2017-11-06', end_date ='2018-07-23') %>% 
  rename(precip_acc_in = parameter_value ) %>% 
  select(-parameter_cd) %>% 
  filter(complete.cases(.)) %>%
  mutate(precip_event_in = c(precip_acc_in[1], diff(precip_acc_in)),
         precip_event_in = if_else(precip_acc_in == precip_event_in, 0, precip_event_in),
         precip_event_mm = 25.4*precip_event_in) #%>% 
  #write_csv("output/CDECprecip_edited.csv")
